title: [GAMEPLAY] Can't change the music from Updated to classic.
body:
When i was playing a ranked game on summoners rift, i tried to change the music from updated to classic, but it still doesn't change.
Steps:
1. I turn on the options menu.
2. I choose the sound tab.
3. I change the filter from updated music to classic.
4. I press Okay to submit the change.
After those steps the music doesn't change, it keeps on playing the updated music. I have tried this in about 3 to 5 ranked games and its still the same.

replies.body:
Hey GhostLead75,

Would you happen to have a screenshot of your sound tab? I'm only seeing an option of 'Updated' on my client.
Well after the update this morning the music works now, and now it looks like this.
Okay, cool! :D Thanks for keeping me in the loop.
